title: Single Huge Spike
body:
Log Reader Results: http://imgur.com/a/tDDL5

Once (and only once) per game, I get a freeze that lasts about 1 second.  It'll occur at anytime during the game but again, only once.  The packet loss shown in the picture isn't even noticeable so I have no problem with that.  Only the single huge spike you see in the "Ping Over Time" graph bothers me.

I've tried repairing from the client, hextech repair tool, uninstalling and reinstalling, internet works fine for everything else, others with same internet provider have no problems, updated drivers...

Anyone have any advice? Rioters, know any fix?

replies.body: Did you try the recommended steps the log reader gave you? Most of the time, it should link to our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

I wish it was that simple for my case!  The graph in the original post is from a custom bot game, no deaths.  Just happened while I was walking around the map :\

The other graph I posted, I don't exactly remember.  I just pulled out a random recent log
here's another graph from a different game http://imgur.com/a/jIYgP
